concept.title: Inter-site Diameter routing behavior between regions

conbody.p: This won't actually have anything to do with Diameter, so a name change is required. Now, Diameter functions are taken care of by the Policy App and Charging App. This will require a file-name change. Should I talk about admin for the policy and charging apps individually or concurrently?
